column3: You’re telling me this actress person is the only woman you ever wanted who didn’t want you back
Is this what it’s like to be you
Wow, you’re really crazy about her, huh
And-and when we’re on stage I get to-to kiss her and-and touch her, but then she goes home with the director, and it’s like somebody’s ripping out my heart
Oh, it’s so great to see you feeling like this
Monica, uh Dad called this morning and ah, Aunt Silvia passed away
We were all pretty shaken up about it
Wait, am I missing something though
‘Cause I thought death was something that’s supposed to be sad, in a way
Well ah, Aunt Silvia was, well not a nice person
Oh, she was a cruel, cranky, old bitch
Did Dad say I get the dollhouse
Wow, a house for dolls, that is so cool
When I was kid, I had a barrel
Uh, Pheebs, you had a barrel for a dollhouse
Y'know what, you can play with my dollhouse
Y'know, when I was younger, all I wanted to do was to play with this dollhouse, but no
It was to be looked at, but never played with
My Grandmother used to say that exact same thing to me
Y'know, you didn’t have to walk me all the way back up here
Honey um, honey, you do realise that we don’t keep the women’s lingerie here in the office
Rachel, I need the Versachi invoice
Joanna, this is my friend Chandler Bing  Joanna
Thanks, it’s ah, Gaelic, for ‘Thy turkey’s done
’ So ah, I’m gonna go, nice, nice meeting you
So ah, what’s wrong with him
Oh, nothing, he’s just goofy like that, I actually, hardly notice it anymore
Oh no, no-no-no, is he ah, married, or involved with anyone
He’s not married, or involved, with anyone
Oh, Rachel,  actually, y'know what, forget it
Well, I’ll ask him for you, if you want me too
Or, is it just to sad and desperate, and y'know something that Sophie would do
Uh, uh, uh, I am here
Wallpaper’s a little faded, that’s okay
So, I’m here, ready to play
I brought a bunch of stuff for the house, so check it out
That’s a dog, every house should have a dog
Not one that can pee on the roof
Well, maybe it’s so big because the house was built on radioactive waste
And is this in case the house sneezes
No, no, that’s the ghost for the attic
But you’ve got one, because the house is sitting on an ancient Indian burial ground
Wait a minute, the house was built on radioactive waste, and an ancient Indian burial ground
Okay, obviously you don’t know much about the U
I need to talk to you
Oh, I'm glad you guys are past that little awkward phase
Okay, my boss, Joanna, when you left, she started asking questions about you
Oh-ho, liked what she saw, huh
Oh thank you, Chandler, this is so great, she’s gonna love me
That-that’s it, that’s it, all right
No dinosaurs, no ghosts, no giant dogs, okay
They’re not the right size, they’re not Victorian, and they just don’t go
Come dinosaur, we’re not welcome in the house of no imagination
Uh, Pheebs, while we’re hovering around the subject
I just have to say dinosaurs, they-they don’t go, rrroof
Listen, I ah, went to that restaurant that you were talking about last week
Come, talk to me a minute
And I ate the food, I had the fish, it was good, yeah
Hi, oh, I’m Lauren, Kate’s understudy
I-I’m a big fan of yours
I used to umm, schedule my classes so I could watch Dr
Drake Remoray on Days of Our Lives
Oh but then, they went and dropped you down that elevator shaft
They gave me the shaft all right
Listen, umm, what are you doing after rehearsals
Do you want to get a drink, or something
Yeah, sure, a drink sounds great
All right, it’s time to act, my talking props
Look everybody, look at my new dollhouse
Oh, okay, it’s the slide instead of stairs
The Licorice Room, you can eat all the furniture
And, when guests come over, they can stay on the tootsie roll-away bed
This is the coolest house ever
Hey, does anybody want to join me in the aroma room
Hey, guys, guys, did you see my new, china cabinet
Hey, my Father’s house does that
Well, the movie was great, dinner was great, and there’s nothing like a cool, crisp New York evening
Of course, I didn’t get to enjoy any of that, because Joanna’s such a big, dull dud
Like he came by to pick me up, and I opened the door, and it was just like, click
Oh, and he’s got such a good heart
Doesn’t he have a good heart
Oh, I know and he’s soo sweet
Listen, he said he was going to call, so put him straight through
I am going to take this call
When I continue, I hope that there will appear on stage this magical thing that in the theatre we call, committing to the moment
What do you see in him anyway
Which is more than I can say for that sweater you’re dating
Hey, I’m not interested in her sweater
It’s what’s underneath her sweater that counts
And besides, since ah, since when do you care who I’m going out with
Why, do you want me to care
Do you want me to want you to care
Okay, I’m afraid to say this, but let’s pick it up where we left off
I’ve got no reason to stay
I’ll see you in the morning
I can’t believe we go on in, in a week
Hey, it’s gonna be all right
So since we’re getting off early, do you want to go and paint mugs
At the place I told you about last night
Oh, yeah, with the mug painting
I was so listening to that
But ah, y'know what, I think I kinda need to work on my stuff tonight
Look, what are we gonna do about this scene, huh
Well umm, maybe if it had more heat
Well, Adrian’s looking for a reason to stay, right
Victor can’t just kiss her, he’s gotta, gotta really give her a reason, y'know
Maybe he could slip her the tongue
Or maybe, maybe he could grab her, and, and, and, and lift her up
Yeah, yeah, and then Adrian, she maybe she could wrap her legs around his waist
And then she could rip off his shirt and kiss his chest, and, and his stomach
And then, then he could use his teeth, his teeth to undo her dress, and, and, and bite her
And then right, right when the scene ends, he could take her with this raw, animal
Yeah, that’s pretty much what I had in mind
It’s a little early to be drinkin’
No-no, things ah, finally happened with Kate
I just, I just watched her sleep for like hours, just breathing in and breathing out
And then I knew she was dreaming ‘cause, ‘cause her eyes keep going like this
I’m telling ya, Joanna’s got it all wrong
All I said was, ‘This was fun
I wonder why she thinks you’re going to call her
That’s what you say at the end of a date
You can’t just say, ‘Nice to meet you, good night
Look it’s the end of the date, I’m standing there, I know all she’s waiting for is for me to say ‘I’ll call her’ and it’s just y'know, comes out
I can’t help it, it’s a compulsion
Come on Rach, when a guy says he’s going to call, it doesn’t mean he’s going to call
Hasn’t it ever happened to you
Maybe he’s intimated by really smart, strong, successful women
Sophie, would you please climb out of my butt
Umm, well ah, maybe he, maybe he feels awkward because you are my boss
The only person that should feel awkward is you, and you didn’t tell him not to call me, did you
Because if you feel uncomfortable with your friend dating someone you work for, there are always ways to fix
Chandler I’m telling you she has flipped out, she’s gone crazy
Oh, well give me the phone then
She thinks it’s my fault that you haven’t called her
Look, you can’t call somebody after this long just to say, ‘In case you didn’t notice, I don’t like you
Well then you’re going to have to take her out again
And she gets this gross mascara goop thing in the corner of her eye
You are going to have to take her out again and end it, and end it in way that she knows it’s actually ended
And, I don’t care how hard it is for you, do not tell her that you will call her again
But it’s just a lunch date, no more than an hour
And from now on I get my own dates, I don’t want you setting me up with anybody ever again
That’s just a lot of big talk, y'know
So I ah, talked to Lauren, kinda told her how things were with us
Did you ah, did you talk to Marshall
Y'know, about what happened with us
And there’s really no reason he should find out, so ah let’s not make a big deal about it, okay
I mean, come on you can’t tell me last night didn’t mean something to you
I-I was there, you’re not that good an actress
Look umm, I, I was, I was just caught up in the moment
Joey, I’m-I’m sorry you feel bad, but haven’t you ever sleep with a women where it meant more to her than it did to you
Sorry I ah, I scared you in there
By the way, I was just checking the shower massager
I tried to reach you at work
Well, we believe it originated here
You don’t want to see what’s under there
It’s, just it’s right here,  and it’s all the time
The food there was, was great
We should do it again sometime
I’m weak, and pathetic, and sorry
Okay, you are going to tell her and you’re going to tell her now
Ahhhh—I’m not going to call you
I’m-I’m-I’m sorry that I said I was going to when I’m not
Look, this has nothing to do with you, y'know
I have serious, serious problems when it comes to women
I have issues with commitment, intimacy,  mascara goop
And I’m really sorry, it’s just that this is not, this isn’t going to work out
Well, this isn’t how I was hoping how this would end, but I guess I have to appreciate your honesty
We should do it again sometime
Well, so anyway Beth, what I’m saying is I should’ve considered your feelings before I went home with you that night
I’ve ah, I’ve recently learned what’s it like to be on your side of it, and I’m sorry
So, do you think you can forgive me
Well ah, actually I kinda need to talk to you too
